document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">tarried </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">always </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">career </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">shorter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">snake's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">delay </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">fleeter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Tare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The mushroom is the elf of plants
